channel.title: Software Engineering on while true: continue
channel.description: Recent content in Software Engineering on while true: continue

item.title: Lessons in Python
item.description: Python’s versioning scheme is a bit at odds with what you might expect. Upload a package with version 0.1.3-dev4, and when you go to pip install mypkg==0.1.3-dev4, it normalizes it to 0.1.3.dev4.
